name: Trick or Treat Simulator (sparklebliss)
description:
Trick or Treat Simulator is a little game about trick or treating. 

Dressed as a ghost, you can explore the neighborhood, interact with neighbors, and collect candy. This game has 10 distinct endings. It is child friendly in terms of content, but younger children will need help reading and may find some aspects frustrating. Therefore, this is recommended as a game to play together.

The game is controlled with the arrow keys .

The music is "The Carnival of the Animals - VII. Aquarium" by Camille Saint-Saëns performed on solo piano by Markus Staab and edited to loop. Adapted and used here in compliance with the recording's Creative Commons license, the full details of which are here.

This game was made with Bitsy.
